title: Old Family Laundry Gets Unpacked In 'The Vacationers'
teaser: With summer approaching, it's time to think about the season's great beach reads. Emma Straub has written a new novel, The Vacationers, that will get you in the mood. NPR's Scott Simon speaks to the young author.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
